name: M. Saif Ibrahim
summary: Full Stack Software Engineer experienced in frontend (React, React Native, Next Js) and backend (Node.js, PostgreSQL, REST APIs, GraphQL) development. Skilled in designing intuitive, user-focused interfaces and building scalable systems for critical applications.

experience.description: Developed scalable backend APIs with TypeScript and cloud infrastructure serving 10+ EU countries. Built complex PostgreSQL architectures for data-driven apps. Created React dashboards with advanced data visualizations, improving engagement by 15%.
Built UIs with React + TypeScript for data filtering/visualization. Collaborated with cross-functional teams in Agile sprints. Optimized responsiveness by 20% with functional programming techniques.
Developed REST/GraphQL APIs in Python, Node.js, and .NET. Architected PostgreSQL schemas for analytics platforms. Built full-stack apps with Next.js and scalable backend systems.

Built real-time communication systems with React/TypeScript frontends and React Native mobile. Developed scalable Flask + MongoDB backends (30% faster retrieval). Worked in distributed teams on production-ready apps.

education.university: Norwegian University of Science and Technology -NTNU
details: Thesis: Zero-Shot Sports Video Understanding with Vision-Language Models
Specialized in AI and Web technologies with focus on machine learning and full-stack development
Research Assistant at Norwegian Cyber Range
Courses: Data Structures, Java, C++, Web Development, Operating Systems, Computer Architecture, system design
Volunteer: Ambassador at SAMF & PSYWSC'19 Conferences

projects.title: FilterStack
projects.description: Browser-based photo editing app with layered filters and complete client-side privacy.

projects.title: QuickMeme
projects.description: A Chrome extension for creating memes from any image with customizable text overlay and styling options.

projects.title: BPPV - Eye Tracker
projects.description: Desktop solution for analyzing Vertigo eye-tracking data in real time or offline with annotations.

projects.title: Curio - Research Assistant
projects.description: Curio is an intelligent research assistant that helps you gather, analyze, and visualize data from multiple sources using advanced AI workflows. Built with LangChain and LangGraph, it seamlessly integrates Python-based data processing with a modern Next.js frontend for interactive research insights.
